name: Icarian's Faith Demo
description:
P.S: This game is still early in development, gaming experience may not be representative of the final product.

Play as Jergens Lalisan Von Aves, a Flightless Paladin Knight of a kingdom known as "The Icarians"; whom embedded with bladed wings as their main weapon. Selected warriors have the ability to fly. Jergens is on a journey to find her daughter in the fictional world called Middle-Kingdom set in 1190 A.D. The players will discover a very disturbing truth about Jergens; and the deepest reason why she can't fly. The truth about her daughter and the Icarians' creed during her quest.

Gameplay Features:

1. Action based combat system

- Fight through Middle-Kingdom with the game's combo system. Combinations of Light and Heavy attacks to create combos and chain them together. Jergens can also use magical weapons as well, such as her bladed wings, Shield and a gun!

2. Difficult traps and hordes of enemies

- Encounter insane traps within Middle-Kingdom and fight hordes of massive enemies that can destroy you in seconds! If you are cornered, Jergens can push away her enemies with her weapons. Be careful! The enemies are tough and some won't flinch from your attacks.

3. Sanity and Insanity Mode

- This feature will help Jergens manipulate the terrains of Middle-Kingdom. Use this feature to pass through platforms, solve puzzles and bypass traps.

4. Find Secrets and Collectibles

- There are Dead Winged Knights, Eyeglasses and Message in a Bottle, each item delivers a flashback narrative dialogue of the story of the game, also you can find secret challenge rooms to gain apples.5. Upgrades

- Collect apples to buy upgrades, new combos and consumable items that can aid you in your quest.

PS. This game supports Xbox Controllers (360 and One).
